interestingcomments.content: Comprehensive Photo Organization Resource? /!/ I have spent the last few years traveling  and have a fairly huge collection of photos (60kish). Other than culling and some top level folders, I have done no organization at all on them. Now that I have some time, I would like to go through all these photos and organize them well before I embark on some projects with them. Since I am doing this all at once, I really need to think it all through beforehand. Does anyone know of a good site or book that lays out all the different things to think through (e.g. rating, keywords, geotagging, facial recognition, catalogs vs.metadata, software options)
